/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. The buildings are predominantly gray and white, reflecting the urban landscape of Beijing. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with a few clouds, adding to the serene atmosphere of the scene. The image is captured during the day, under bright sunlight, which illuminates the scene and brings out the details of the buildings and trees.
